attributes.action: answer at least one petition without giving it the brush off.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Of all of the petitions listed on this site, has a single one resulted in the government changing their mind and moving in a different policy direction? The best any petition seems to get is an answer in par for the course government spin. Will the PM admit that this petition site is not fulfilling the democratic needs of the country?

rejection.details: Feedback should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
